Research Note Vault
- Single HTML file with inline CSS and JS only; no external libraries or dependencies.
- Auto-detects system dark/light mode via `prefers-color-scheme` and switches theme instantly; manual toggle button in header.
- Main screen: searchable vault of research notes, each as a card with title, content textarea, tags (comma-separated), and timestamp.
- Keyboard support: Tab/Shift+Tab for navigation, Enter to add new note, Arrow keys to select notes, Delete to remove selected note, Ctrl/Cmd+F for search focus.
- Core actions: Add note (title + content + tags), edit selected note, delete selected note; all changes save to localStorage automatically.
- Search: live filter by title/content/tags; highlights matches; clear button.
- Tags: auto-suggest from existing tags as user types; click tag chips to filter.
- Undo/Redo: full history stack (up to 50 steps) with Ctrl/Cmd+Z/Y keyboard shortcuts and buttons.
- Sort notes by: newest first, oldest first, title A-Z, or relevance to search.
- Export: button to download JSON file of all notes (title, content, tags, timestamp).
- Import: file input to upload JSON; merges with existing notes, prompts overwrite confirmation.
- UI: responsive grid of cards (1-col mobile, 2-4 col desktop); sticky header with search bar, controls, theme toggle.
- Empty state: friendly message with "Add your first note" CTA when no notes.
- Persistence: localStorage with auto-save every 2s and on blur; graceful recovery on load.
- Accessibility: ARIA labels/roles, high contrast mode compatible, focus outlines, screen reader friendly note reading.
- Max 100 notes for performance; prompt to export/archive if exceeded.
- Testable: Load app, add/edit/search/delete notes, toggle theme, undo changes, export/import JSON, verify keyboard nav.
